text.no_account: No account found. Please register an account by sending /u/adatip a private message with +register as the subject and anything in the message. If you believe this was in error, contact /u/geitir
text.tip_exception: Your tip was reported unsuccessful for the following reason: {0}
text.command_exception: Your command was reported unsuccessful for the following reason: {0}
text.auto_register:
You've been tipped {0} ADA by a member of the Cardano community. An account has automatically been created for you to accept this tip. These are your unique addresses which are used as an identifier and for deposits:

Your standard (on-chain with fees, no maximum amount per tip) deposit address is:

{1}

Your microtip (off-chain, no fees, maximum {2} ADA per tip) deposit address is:

{3}

Remember, only send ADA coin to these addresses!!!

 To learn how to withdrawal the tip you recieved as well as use other commands, please visit the adatip [wiki](https://www.reddit.com/r/adatip/wiki/index)
text.balance:
Your current reported balance from your standard wallet is: {0} ADA

Your current reported balance from your microtip wallet is: {1} ADA
text.command_not_understood: Sorry your command could not be understood. Please visit the adatip [wiki](https://www.reddit.com/r/adatip/wiki/index) for information on how to use the bot.
text.deposit_recieved: A deposit of {0} ADA to your {1} wallet has been recieved and will be available for tipping in the next few minutes.

special.fee_from_amount: ^^*Portion of transfer fee had to be taken from amount specified as remaining wallet balance would've been insufficient
special.mtip_possible: ^^This transaction could have been sent off-chain with zero fees if you had a microtip balance
